onDynamicSensorDisconnected(android.hard.Description: Called when there is a dynamic sensor being disconnected from the system.

Parameters: Sensor: the newly connected sensor. See @B_android#hardware#Sensor_E@.
onDynamicSensorConnected(android.hardwar.Description: Called when there is a dynamic sensor being connected to the system.

ClassDesc: Used for receiving notifications from the SensorManager when dynamic sensors are connected or disconnected.
